SummaryEnglish: Kurono Kei, a high school freshman, put on airs and thought only about girls. One day, on his way home, he comes across a man who accidentally fell from the train platform. He didn't care for other people, and at first he enjoyed watching this man that was about to die. However, Katou Masaru, who was a classmate in his elementary days, suddenly gets onto the train tracks from the train platform to help the man. Being asked for help, Kei reluctantly began to help him. But when they got the man onto the platform, the train came. They must have been killed by the train, but they were transferred into a room of a condominium in a moment. There, they found a black sphere and people who are supposed to be dead like them. They couldn't get out of the room, and they couldn't even touch the wall. What is the room? What is this ball?

2.SummaryEnglish: After trying to rescue a man on the subway tracks, two teens wake up in a room dominated by a mysterious black sphere that sends them to hunt down and kill aliens hiding on Earth.

3.SummaryEnglish: Kato's (Ken'ichi Matsuyama) death changes Kurono's (Kazunari Ninomiya) view of life completely. He decides to keep fighting until he earns 100 points so that he can bring back Kato. GANTZ calls back several other unwilling participants that were allowed to leave after scoring 100 points. Before Kurono succeeds in resurrecting Kato, he unexpectedly comes back. GANTZ and the fighters take on another enemy worse than ever before. To make matters worse, GANTZ starts acting up. GANTZ chooses the next target... this time it's not an alien but a human girl. Each unwilling participant in GANTZ's twisted game has a different motive for fighting, whether to protect a loved one or to do what they think is right.

4.SummaryEnglish: This film is an alternate perspective version of the first Gantz film from an investigative journalists point of view and depicts the secrets of Kurono and Kato's childhood, and also other character's secrets. Delving deep into the mystery, the film offers another piece towards solving the complex puzzle that is the world of Gantz.

1.TitleEnglish: It's the Beginning of a Brand New Day
1.SummaryEnglish: Introduction of the cruel selfish setting, Korono Kei, and Kato Masaku. This episodes ends with the first sight of the black sphere known only as Gantz and a couple of the other characters who will play more important roles later on.   Most of the episode is done with the Korono's internal monologue.

2.SummaryEnglish: Green onions are enough for me. That's what the poor little alien says, but green onions aren't enough for the trigger happy alien hunters who are being controlled by the black ball known as Gantz. After seeing a dog going down on a girl, and the same girl nearly getting raped, you'd think it couldn't get worse right? Wrong. In this episode, we see just how rutheless the "dead" can be when given space age weapons and a mission.

3.SummaryEnglish: The new Gantz participants have to face off against a really nasty alien.

4.SummaryEnglish: Kei, Katou and Kishimoto learn from Nishi about the scoring system involved in the alien hunt. Nishi also tells them about boundaries and ground rules when they are not transported to fight aliens.

5.SummaryEnglish: Now that Kurono, Kato, and Kishimoto are alive again, they can return to their regular lives… or can they? What trouble awaits the three in the future? Are they really alive? And, can Kurono survive a fight with a school bully?

6.SummaryEnglish: After finding Kishimoto asleep at his door, Kurono has one lucky streak after the other. Eventually, Kishimoto asks if she can stay with him! Kato is, however, unaware of Kishimoto’s problems. Will she tell him? Meanwhile, everyone else has problems of their own...

7.SummaryEnglish: Kurono and Kishimoto decide to head to Kishimoto’s old house to see what the "other Kishimoto is like". What will they discover? Meanwhile, Kato is having trouble at home, with his aunt beating his littler brother, and at school, with bullies picking on his friends. When a senior challenges him to a fight, will he go too far?

8.SummaryEnglish: Gantz calls Kurono, Kishimoto, Kato, and Nishi once again. But, who else will it call and what new mission does it have for them?

9.TitleEnglish: I'll Kill You Without a Moment's Hesitation
9.SummaryEnglish: The bikers kick Tetsu out of the gang, Kurono doesn't have his suit, Nishi badmouths everyone, then the hunt for the Suzuki alien begins.

10.SummaryEnglish: Kurono, without a suit, follows the Suzuki alien until he makes it mad, then leads it to the others. Nishi and the alien face off in the canal.

12.SummaryEnglish: The team splits. Kato, Kishimoto and Hojo go after the other Suzuki aliens. Kato's suit runs out of power. Kurono, Testu & Haruya find the rest.

13.SummaryEnglish: Kurono faces off against the main alien alone. The survivors get their scores.

1.SummaryEnglish: Kato stands up to his aunt and moves out, Kishimoto leaves Kurono, and Tetsu's life falls apart.

2.SummaryEnglish: Kei is crushed by Kishimoto's decision.

3.SummaryEnglish: The priest convinces the others that Kato is a demon. The game begins. Meanwhile two punks go bum hunting.

4.TitleEnglish: I Can Shoot Them, Can't I?
4.SummaryEnglish: The team takes on the Colossi, the bum hunter continue.

5.SummaryEnglish: Kurono takes out the green colossus, the team goes after the red one, but the fight's not over, more statues awaken.

6.SummaryEnglish: After the fight with the Red and Green Colossi, the team must take on several man sized statues, plus a Colossal Buddha!

7.SummaryEnglish: The battle with the statues continues, with tragic consequences.

8.SummaryEnglish: The final battle with the statues, who will survive?

9.SummaryEnglish: Having barely survived the last mission, Kurono is drawn back in. This time the players include the bookshop clerk, his teacher, and the bum hunters. The rest introduce themselves and Kurono snaps.

10.SummaryEnglish: Gantz makes Kurono the target! Everyone sees Kurono as the person that killed them.

11.SummaryEnglish: The team realize the bum hunters are psycho and team up with Kurono to try and stop them.

12.SummaryEnglish: The team tracks the bum hunters to a funeral home and a firefight breaks out.

13.SummaryEnglish: The final fight for Kurono and the game ends
